circumstances: After a night landing at Belle Glade, the twin engine airplane overran, collided with trees and crashed in flames. The pilot, sole on board, evacuated the cabin and was not recovered by authorities. The flight was illegal and a load of 4,000 lbs of marijuana was found on board.
probable_cause: Overshoot and subsequent collision with trees during landing roll after the pilot misjudged distance and speed and failed to initiate a go-around.
